data.title: Jones Family PDF - Paul Ridenour's Home Page
data.meta_description: Jones Family PDF - Paul Ridenour's Home Page
data.text: Descendants of JEREMIAH JONES Generation 1 1. JEREMIAH 1 JONES was born in 1770 in Virginia (son Jesse G Jones stated his father was born VA mother born MD in 1880 Morgan Co AL Census). He died on 22 Apr 1847 in Blount County, Alabama (Date given on War 1812 Warrant application). He married MARY SWISHER, daughter of Swisher in 1786 in Knox County, Tennessee by Parson Reneau (MARRIAGE 1786 Knox Co. TN. Date & maiden name taken from avadavit given by Mary Jones 21 Aug 1851 Walker Co. AL War 1812 widows application). She was born in 1766 in Maryland (1850 Blount Co AL Census in home of son James Jones. Mary age 84 born MD son Jesse G Jones stated his father was born VA mother born MD in 1880 Morgan Co AL Census). She died between Dec 1852-1855 in Walker or Blount County, Alabama (As per Jeremiah's Military Land Warrant listing widow Mary Jones dated 10 Dec 1852. No request made for land in 1855 assuming she had died.). JEREMIAH JONES and MARY SWISHER had the following children: 2. i. NANCY 2 JONES was born in 1791 in Tennessee (Probably Knox or Rhea County). She died between 1842-1849 in Yell County, Arkansas or McDonald County, Missouri possibly on the road to Missouri (Robert & Nancy sold land in Blount Co AL 06 Sep 1842 and Robert Pickle m Adeline Southerland ca 1849 McDonald County, Missouri). She married (1) ROBERT S PICKLE on 28 Nov 1820 in Alabama. He was born in 1791 in North Carolina. He died on 17 Nov 1863 in California (need to verify this date). She married (2) JAMES MADISON SR JONES, son of Jones on 04 Dec 1814 in Maury, Tennessee (James Madison Jones Jr was said to be named for his father who was said to be a James Madison Jones from TN. this marriage fits but not verified this is correct.). He was born in 1790 in Tennessee. He died about 1819 in Tennessee or Alabama. 3. ii. MICHAEL S JONES was born between 1787-1794 in Tennessee (Probably Knox or Rhea County). He died after 1863 in Tennessee or Alabama. He married Edy Harwood, daughter of Nathan Harwood and Hannah on 20 Dec 1815 in Rhea County, Tennessee (MARRIAGE). She was born in 1800 in East Tennessee. She died after 1860 in Coffee County, Tennessee, USA. 4. iii. JAMES JONES was born in 1795 in Tennessee (Probably Knox or Rhea County). He died between 1854-1860 in Blount County, Alabama or Giles County Tennessee (Alive selling land Blount County Alabama Deed Book H, page 268, 18 February 1854 James Jones and Jane Jones his wife. James doesn't appear on 1860 Census). He married AMANDA JANE BAKER, daughter of Peter Baker and Margaret Laura "Peggy" Regan on 13 Sep 1821 in Morgan County, Alabama (Applied for marriage license 12 Sep 1821 Limestone County, Alabama. Married 13 Sep 1821 Morgan County, Alabama). She was born in 1805 in Green County, Tennessee. She died between 1861-1870 in Blount County, Alabama or Giles County, Tennessee (29 Aug 1861 date filed listing her on Estate Settlement of Jeremiah Jones. Does not appear on 1870 census.). 5. iv. WILLIAM JONES was born in 1800 in Tennessee (Probably Knox or Rhea County). He died between 1845-1850 in Blount County, Alabama. He married Cynthia "Cintha" Hill, daughter of Micajah Hill and Dorcas Elizabeth Mobely on 16 Feb 1825 in Morgan, Alabama (Applied for marriage license 16 Feb 1825. Married 16 Feb 1825 Morgan County, Alabama). She was born in 1805 in Tennessee or North Carolina. She died in Blount County, Alabama (not listed on 1880 census). 6. v. GEORGE JEREMIAH JONES was born in 1804 in Rhea County, Tennessee (Probably Knox or Rhea County). He died in May 1860 in Freestone County, Texas (U.S. Federal Census Mortality Schedule June 1859-June1860 George J. Jones Year: 1860 County: Freestone State: TX Age: 58 Gender: M Month of Death: May State of Birth: TN ID#: MRT197_171421 Occupation: FARMER Cause of Death: PNEUMONIA). He married Sarah Lauderdale, daughter of James Lauderdale and Anne Jones on 23 Sep 1824 in Morgan County, Alabama (Alabama Marriages 1800-1869 Name: Sarah Lauderdale Spouse: George Jones Marriage Date: 23
